CustomField.formula: If (( Qty_4__c >0), (If (Inventory__c =TRUE, ((Cost_4__c /(1- Margin_Qty_4__c ) )+ (Cost_4__c * Freight_Percentage__c )+( Freight_Cost_Per_Case__c )+( Cost_4__c *0.01)), ((Cost_4__c / (1- Margin_Qty_4__c ))+ (Cost_4__c * Freight_Percentage__c )+( Freight_Cost_Per_Case__c )))), 0)
CustomField.label: Sell Price - Qty 4
